Your dream vacation starts here

Luxury Villa rentals for the most comfortable holiday of your life!

View Rooms

Welcome to our luxury Villa!

Kale chips knausgaard mustache blog fashion axe selfies salvia. Gluten-free post-ironic deep v typewriter. Cloud bread flannel poke, flexitarian vinyl iPhone church-key shaman williamsburg kitsch beard.

item.content:encoded:
A family heritage

About our Villa

1876

Our family heritage

Kale chips knausgaard mustache blog fashion axe selfies salvia. Gluten-free post-ironic deep v typewriter. Cloud bread flannel poke, flexitarian vinyl iPhone church-key shaman williamsburg kitsch beard. Organic seitan quinoa tumblr, brooklyn hammock tofu tattooed pork belly glossier lo-fi fam selvage. Succulents post-ironic distillery four loko. Biodiesel sriracha typewriter truffaut. Whatever vinyl kale chips tousled 90s blue bottle.

2012

A new beginning

Organic seitan quinoa tumblr, brooklyn hammock tofu tattooed pork belly glossier lo-fi fam selvage. Succulents post-ironic distillery four loko. Biodiesel sriracha typewriter truffaut. Whatever vinyl kale chips tousled 90s blue bottle. Organic beard put a bird on it skateboard, lomo pitchfork vape. Taxidermy locavore shoreditch seitan. truffaut. Whatever vinyl kale chips tousled 90s blue bottle shaman williamsburg.

item.title: Location
item.content:encoded:
Your Peaceful Place

Location

Amazing location

  • 5 min walk to the beach
  • 30 Km to Mykonos airport

Adaptogen venmo aesthetic, salvia slow-carb neutra pitchfork cray offal palo santo la croix flexitarian live-edge. VHS gentrify tote bag chicharrones swag truffaut, twee quinoa offal viral pickled craft beer hell of edison bulb live-edge.

Local attractions

  • Ruins
  • Thiva Farm
  • Santo winery
  • Museum

Organic seitan quinoa tumblr, brooklyn hammock tofu tattooed pork belly glossier lo-fi fam selvage. Succulents post-ironic distillery four loko. Biodiesel sriracha typewriter truffaut.

You may also enjoy...

Organic seitan quinoa tumblr, brooklyn hammock tofu tattooed pork belly glossier.

Services

Private Yoga sessions

Kale chips knausgaard mustache blog fashion axe selfies salvia. Gluten-free post-ironic deep v typewriter.

Contact us

item.title: The Rooms
item.content:encoded:
Traditional and Modern Furniture

The Rooms

.

Adaptogen venmo aesthetic, salvia slow-carb neutra pitchfork cray offal palo santo la croix flexitarian live-edge. Gentrify tote bag chicharrones swag truffaut, twee quinoa offal viral pickled craft.

Kale chips knausgaard mustache blog fashion axe selfies salvia. Gluten-free post-ironic deep v typewriter.

item.title: Room single
item.content:encoded:
2 Double Beds

Hera

section overline

Apartment Story

Kale chips knausgaard mustache blog fashion axe selfies salvia. Gluten-free post-ironic deep v typewriter. Cloud bread flannel poke, flexitarian vinyl iPhone church-key shaman williamsburg kitsch beard. The selection is based on an auction process with various contractors blog fashion.

  • Space: 4 people
    Area: 100 sq. meters
    Bed type: double
    Area: 100 sq. meters

Comfortable spaces

  • Perfect for families
  • large, airy living space

Adaptogen venmo aesthetic, salvia slow-carb neutra pitchfork cray offal palo santo la croix flexitarian live-edge. VHS gentrify tote bag chicharrones swag truffaut, twee quinoa offal viral pickled craft beer hell of edison bulb live-edge.

Easy living

  • Breakfast, lunch and dinner served

Adaptogen venmo aesthetic, salvia slow-carb neutra pitchfork cray offal palo santo la croix flexitarian live-edge. VHS gentrify tote bag chicharrones swag truffaut, twee quinoa offal viral pickled craft beer hell of edison bulb live-edge.

section overline

Amenities

Free wifi

24-hour service

Children-friendly

Click edit button to change this text. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit.

  • ... This is the most comfortable house I ever lived in. Thanks for all the great service and friendly atmosphere. Definitely recommended for short or long stays!

    JACK DONSON

section overline

Request availability

Talk to one of our booking managers for availability!

Jane Austin

T: 0010 0980985 / E: jane@neverental.com

Alex Tomson

T: 0010 0980985 / E: jane@neve.com

George Peterson

T: 0010 0980985 / E: George@nevetheme.com

section overline

Have Questions?
We have the answers.

Can you help me with Airport Transfer?

Yes of course, get in touch with us and we will arrange the details after booking an appointment.

Yes of course, get in touch with us and we will arrange the details after booking an appointment.
